trans-unit.source: Graphics and animation
trans-unit.target: Graphics and animation

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section get you started with using graphics and animations in your store apps.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section get you started with using graphics and animations in your store apps.

trans-unit.source: Graphics and animation
trans-unit.target: Graphics and animation

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section get you started with using graphics and animations in your store apps.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section get you started with using graphics and animations in your store apps.

trans-unit.source: Note
trans-unit.target: Note

trans-unit.source: Graphics and animation is designed for use by app developers using XAML.
trans-unit.target: Graphics and animation is designed for use by app developers using XAML.

trans-unit.source: If you want to add graphics and animation to a game using Microsoft DirectX, see [Games and DirectX](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt228375).
trans-unit.target: If you want to add graphics and animation to a game using Microsoft DirectX, see [Games and DirectX](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt228375).

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Draw shapes
trans-unit.target: Draw shapes

trans-unit.source: Learn how to draw shapes, such as ellipses, rectangles, polygons, and paths.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to draw shapes, such as ellipses, rectangles, polygons, and paths.

trans-unit.source: The [Path](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR243355) class is the way to visualize a fairly complex vector-based drawing language in a XAML UI; for example, you can draw Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: The [Path](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR243355) class is the way to visualize a fairly complex vector-based drawing language in a XAML UI; for example, you can draw Bezier curves.

trans-unit.source: Use brushes
trans-unit.target: Use brushes

trans-unit.source: [Brush](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR228076) objects are used to paint the interiors or outlines of shapes, text, and parts of controls, so that the object being painted is visible in a UI.
trans-unit.target: [Brush](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR228076) objects are used to paint the interiors or outlines of shapes, text, and parts of controls, so that the object being painted is visible in a UI.

trans-unit.source: Animations overview
trans-unit.target: Animations overview

trans-unit.source: Use the animations from the Windows Runtime animation library to integrate the Windows look and feel into your app.
trans-unit.target: Use the animations from the Windows Runtime animation library to integrate the Windows look and feel into your app.

trans-unit.source: Transforms overview
trans-unit.target: Transforms overview

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use transforms in the Windows Runtime API, by changing the relative coordinate systems of elements in the UI.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use transforms in the Windows Runtime API, by changing the relative coordinate systems of elements in the UI.

trans-unit.source: This can be used to adjust the appearance of individual XAML elements, such as scaling, rotating, or transforming the position in x-y space.
trans-unit.target: This can be used to adjust the appearance of individual XAML elements, such as scaling, rotating, or transforming the position in x-y space.

trans-unit.source: Visual layer
trans-unit.target: Visual layer

trans-unit.source: The Windows.UI.Composition API gives you access to the composition layer between the framework layer (XAML), and the graphics layer (DirectX).
trans-unit.target: The Windows.UI.Composition API gives you access to the composition layer between the framework layer (XAML), and the graphics layer (DirectX).

trans-unit.source: The Windows.UI.Composition API allow you to create composition objects and apply powerful animations, effects and manipulations on those objects in your application.
trans-unit.target: The Windows.UI.Composition API allow you to create composition objects and apply powerful animations, effects and manipulations on those objects in your application.
